actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the exclusion from gross income of up to $200 of dividends and interest received by individuals during a taxable year.

summary.text: Permits, under the Internal Revenue Code, the exclusion from gross income of up to $200 of dividends and interest received by individuals during a taxable year. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 116)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the exclusion from gross income of up to $200 of dividends and interest received by individuals during a taxable year.
